author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Bathroom ceiling insulation tips…I used R-38 paper faced insulation and stapled it to the framing. I also created a small boxed in area for the recessed light. This keeps the bathroom cool in the summer and cozy in the winter. For more bathroom renovation tips and full step-by-step tutorials visit https://homerepairtutor.com 🔥#insulation #bathroomremodel #homerenovation #diy #homerepairtutor
title: Bathroom Ceiling Insulation Tips - #shorts #insulation #bathroomrenovation #homerepairtutor
